blog.name: buskuta
blog.title: endgame spoilers
blog.description: Keti | I write fanfic for Marvel. Here's my AO3

summary: May My Mind Understand
title: May My Mind Understand
body:
Peter kneels down. “Hey, Mister Stark, it’s me, Peter.”

A pause. “Yeah, kid, I know,” Tony says dryly. Peter stumbles back in shock.

OR: When Iron Man snaps his fingers, the suit takes the worst of the damage, effectively protecting Tony.


AO3 Link

“I am… Iron Man.”

Peter is too busy fighting the monster-alien hybrids to focus on anything else in the battle. He’s taking three at once when a blast suddenly pushes him back, leaving him rolling a few feet until he stops, winded, on the warm, fiery ground. Peter momentarily forgets that the battle of their lives is currently raging around him, that there are three angry monster-alien things trying to eat him. His spidey-senses, which have been screaming danger ever since he woke up on Titan, are dialling down.

Peter staggers to his feet and spins around in a circle, trying to figure out why his spidey-senses aren’t working and where the alien monsters are. But the monsters he was fighting just a few seconds ago are gone. What happened?

Then, Peter realizes that it’s quiet. Way too quiet. Quieter than when Flash talked back to Mr. Mac in physics class. His mask suddenly retracts and Peter is breathing in the strong smell of smoke.
Peter sees it. All around him, the monster-alien hybrids are fading. They’re turning dusty just like Peter did on Titan. They’re all fading, and oh, no, it’s happening again. The last he saw, though, the awesome flying lady had the gauntlet. Did Thanos get it back? Did he win again?

But then Peter realizes that it’s only the aliens that are fading, no one else. Everyone else is fine, solid, and not dusty. It’s only the bad guys that are disappearing. Hope blossoms in Peter’s chest. They did it. They finally won.

Peter sees everyone grouping together a few yards away and half runs over to them. But all of his hope wilts like a drying rose when he sees what – or, more accurately, who – everyone is grouping around. Tony Stark is laying on the ground, propped up against a rock, Pepper and Rhodey standing above him. Did – no – there’s no way –

Peter shoves past everyone into the clearing. He wastes no time approaching Tony. Tears well up in his eyes and his vision is watery. This can’t be happening. Tony was supposed to fine, he was fine, Peter hugged him just a few minutes ago. Peter takes in the Iron Man suit, charred and sparking, and the right arm of the suit half melted away to reveal Tony’s real arm inside. In Peter’s blurry vision, he makes out several colourful shapes in the hand. They look like the ones that were on the gauntlet he gave to the flying lady.

It hits Peter.

Tony snapped his fingers, just like Thanos did, except he only made the bad guys disappear. Tony did it. They didn’t win. He did.

But now…

Peter kneels down. “Hey, Mister Stark, it’s me, Peter.” He hopes Tony knows it’s him. He has to say goodbye.

There’s a pause. “Yeah, kid, I know,” Tony says dryly, and it shocks Peter so much he stumbles a little. Mister Stark’s eyes are focused and his voice is steady. Tears that had welled up in Peter’s wide eyes fall down his cheeks. He stares at Tony. He looks – he looks fine.

“We won, Mister Stark,” Peter says finally. His mind can’t catch up. Just in case this is false hope, or wishful thinking, or something – Tony has to know that they won, and that it’s okay now. “We did it. We won.”
“Yeah, I sure hope we did,” Tony says. “Those stones fried my suit. Now I know what it feels like to get sizzled. Never eating bacon again. I sympathize too much now.”

Peter blinks at him in pure shock. Tony snorts. “Help me up, kid, will you?” He reaches his hand up. Peter instinctively grasps it and pulls his mentor to his feet.

“I – are you okay?” Peter asks, because he doesn’t know what else to say. He doesn’t let go of Tony’s hand. Tony stares down at him.

“Of course I am. Why wouldn’t I be?”

“I just – I thought –“

“The suit took most of the damage. Speaking of, let’s - “ Tony taps his arc reactor and the suits retracts. And Tony – he’s fine. He’s completely fine. Well, Peter notices, his right arm looks burned, but he’s fine and alive and this is so much better than Peter ever could have hoped for.

Peter looks Tony up and down. He’s completely fine. He’s alive. He’s here. And he’s looking at Peter with something in his eyes that Peter can’t quite identify. But he doesn’t care. Tony is okay. He’s okay. Before Peter’s mind can even realize what his body is doing, he’s wrapping his arms around Tony and hugging him tightly. After a brief moment, Peter feels hesitant arms on his back. This is nice, he thinks, just like their hug from earlier.

Peter hears a cough from somewhere behind him and remembers that everyone is still there. He lets go of Tony and turns around to see everyone looking at them with varying expressions. Peter sees Captain America staring at them with absolutely nothing but relief. Pepper is smiling at them tearfully and Rhodey has an arm around Tony’s shoulders now. The awesome flying lady is staring at them too, and even though her face is devoid of emotion, Peter can see the spark in her eyes. Even the cool wizard, who was super pretentious earlier, looks at peace.

Steve steps forward and places a hand heavily on Tony’s shoulder. “You alright?” He asks him. Tony looks at him.

“Always,” Tony says. And Peter’s mind is finally catching up. They won; Tony is okay. It’s finally over.
body_abstract:
Peter kneels down. “Hey, Mister Stark, it’s me, Peter.”

A pause. “Yeah, kid, I know,” Tony says dryly. Peter stumbles back in shock.

OR: When Iron Man snaps his fingers, the suit takes the worst of the damage, effectively protecting Tony.


AO3 Link

“Yeah, I sure hope we did,” Tony says. “Those stones fried my suit. Now I know what it feels like to get sizzled. Never eating bacon again. I sympathize too much now.”

Peter blinks at him in pure shock. Tony snorts. “Help me up, kid, will you?” He reaches his hand up. Peter instinctively grasps it and pulls his mentor to his feet.

“I – are you okay?” Peter asks, because he doesn’t know what else to say. He doesn’t let go of Tony’s hand. Tony stares down at him.

“Of course I am. Why wouldn’t I be?”

“I just – I thought –“

“The suit took most of the damage. Speaking of, let’s - “ Tony taps his arc reactor and the suits retracts. And Tony – he’s fine. He’s completely fine. Well, Peter notices, his right arm looks burned, but he’s fine and alive and this is so much better than Peter ever could have hoped for.

Peter looks Tony up and down. He’s completely fine. He’s alive. He’s here. And he’s looking at Peter with something in his eyes that Peter can’t quite identify. But he doesn’t care. Tony is okay. He’s okay. Before Peter’s mind can even realize what his body is doing, he’s wrapping his arms around Tony and hugging him tightly. After a brief moment, Peter feels hesitant arms on his back. This is nice, he thinks, just like their hug from earlier.

Peter hears a cough from somewhere behind him and remembers that everyone is still there. He lets go of Tony and turns around to see everyone looking at them with varying expressions. Peter sees Captain America staring at them with absolutely nothing but relief. Pepper is smiling at them tearfully and Rhodey has an arm around Tony’s shoulders now. The awesome flying lady is staring at them too, and even though her face is devoid of emotion, Peter can see the spark in her eyes. Even the cool wizard, who was super pretentious earlier, looks at peace.

Steve steps forward and places a hand heavily on Tony’s shoulder. “You alright?” He asks him. Tony looks at him.

“Always,” Tony says. And Peter’s mind is finally catching up. They won; Tony is okay. It’s finally over.

blog.name: spider-starry
blog.title: Writes Marvel Fanfiction While Crying
blog.description:
✨Starry | 19 | Pisces| Marvel Stan | ✨
✨Send Asks | Shitposts | Fanfics✨
https://www.wattpad.com/user/TheStarry_Night

summary:
Y/n: Dad, I'm dating Peter.
Tony: Peter who?
Y/n: Parker.
Tony: My son?
Y/n: He's not your son.
Tony: I adopted him. 
Y/n: No...
body:
Y/n: Dad, I’m dating Peter.

Tony: Peter who?

Y/n: Parker.

Tony: My son?

Y/n: He’s not your son.

Tony: I adopted him.

Y/n: No you didn’t.

Tony: I actually did. Peter was present when it happened.

Peter: … I can explain.

reblog.comment:

Y/n: Parker.

Tony: My son?

Y/n: He’s not your son.

Tony: I adopted him.

Y/n: No you didn’t.

Tony: I actually did. Peter was present when it happened.

Peter: … I can explain.

blog.name: ao3feed-peterparker
blog.title: AO3Feed: Peter Parker
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

summary: Leaky Faucet
title: Leaky Faucet
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HjSZXW

by MaryaDmitrievnaLikesSundays

Random Villain Of The Week manages to leak all of the footage that FRIDAY has captured over the past year. The public expected banter, they expected training accidents and superheroes caught with their pants down.

They didn’t expect to witness every time an Avenger’s past has come back to haunt them.

—

Aka, the avengers go through a lot of shit that the people didn’t know about

Words: 2178, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, James Rhodes, Sam Wilson, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Random Villain Of The Week, Pepper Potts, Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), Friday (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Steve Rogers & Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes & Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers & Natasha Romanov & Sam Wilson, Peter Parker & Avengers Team, Tony Stark & Avengers Team, Clint Barton & Natasha Romanov, Bruce Banner & Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Wanda Maximoff/Vision
  • Additional Tags: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Tony Stark Has Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, Flashbacks, Panic Attacks, Anxiety, Anxiety Disorder, Anxiety Attacks, Depression, Mental Health Issues, Mental Instability, Leaked Footage, Video Cameras, Avengers Tower, Knives, Violence, Past Torture, Abuse, Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Past Abuse, Past Child Abuse, Assault, Post-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), Not Captain America: Civil War (Movie) Compliant, Suicide, suicide ideation, Suicide Attempt


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HjSZXW

by MaryaDmitrievnaLikesSundays

Random Villain Of The Week manages to leak all of the footage that FRIDAY has captured over the past year. The public expected banter, they expected training accidents and superheroes caught with their pants down.

They didn’t expect to witness every time an Avenger’s past has come back to haunt them.

—

Aka, the avengers go through a lot of shit that the people didn’t know about

summary: can i request one for after endgame where the reader is really close with peter (esp. because she’s an avenger (ish) and knows...
question: can i request one for after endgame where the reader is really close with peter (esp. because she’s an avenger (ish) and knows tony personally) and she gets excited seeing peter and just soft brother sister relationship type things
answer:
“Peter!” You yell at him as he flies through one of the portals, he looks down and sees you waving your arms around like a Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man. He laughs at you before coming down and landing beside you. 

“Ah, I’ve missed you. I went to space and it’s epic! I wish you came with me, except the whole turning to dust thing and sitting on that planet for five years, that part sucked.” He says excitedly before telling you how boring it was without you. 

“Hey! I turned to ash as well, except in Wakanda. After you and Tony left, Bruce called Steve and then we had this big meet-up saving Vision and Wanda, and then went to Wakanda—which was sick, by the way—and then after Thanos came I turned into ash.” You explain fast and out of breath. 

You two hug, something you’ve missed doing for five years. Even though, you two fight all the time about the lamest things, you missed having him around as much as he annoys you. “Wow! Peter!” You pull away from the hug and look up to see a gauntlet flying over your heads. Peter yells out that he’s got it before returning to the fight. You follow him, taking out as many of Thanos’ army as you can, having Peter’s back. 

You finish killing a weird looking creature before looking up and not seeing Peter. Panic, runs through your whole body. You just got him back, you can’t lose him again. “No, no, no, Peter!” You scream out to him but the fight is too loud now to hear anything else. 

“Hey! Follow me,” a woman on a flying horse says kindly, giving her hand out to you. She’s beautiful, you think before taking her hand. She’s a Valkyrie, you piece together in your head. You had heard stories about them from Thor and Loki, they made a huge impact on their lives. According to Thor, he always wanted to be a Valkyrie when he grew up. You always laughed at him when he said that.

As she flies over thousands on people fighting, you eyes narrow in on a group down below. All women teaming up for what? Then you see him red and blue suit that Tony gave to him. “Peter!” You scream happily. 

After the women go, you and Peter keep on fighting for what seems like an eternity, until, they all start to turn to dust, much like you did five years ago. 

“Mr. Stark?” Peter’s voice almost fails him. You turn around and see Tony leaning up against a piece of rubble, barely hanging onto life. 

You stand beside Steve, not wanting to intrude on their moment. Although, you had known Tony personally, you felt more distant from him than ever after you spent five years in some weird realm, with majority of Steve’s team. You became much closer to Sam and Bucky. You felt a nudge on your shoulder pulling you out of your thought. Steve slightly nudges you towards Tony. Slowly, you make you way over to his side next to Peter.

“Hey, Tony,” you say softly. “We won and I just want to thank you for everything you’ve done… for me and this world. You’re a legend. You did it, Tony, you did it.” you softly cry but manage to get your words to him. He manages to look at you and give you a soft smile. 

You gently pull Peter back, letting Pepper have her time with Tony, knowing it will be her last. 

“We’ll be okay, Pete. I promise. We’ll never be separated again.” You tell him, knowing that he’ll be needing you in the next months to come, and he’ll be there for you when you need it.

summary: When Harley found out that his boyfriend, at times acts like a spider, he was mostly intrigued and just made him love his...
question: When Harley found out that his boyfriend, at times acts like a spider, he was mostly intrigued and just made him love his spider-boyf even more because "oh my god, he just hissed at Tony lol"
answer:
“Hey babe do you want to grab some Tai-WHAT THE FUCK!”

Harley could not believe his eyes. He stared up at the high ceiling of the lab in pure shock and confusion. Well as much shock and confusion he could muster, he was dating certain spider boy after all.

Speaking of spider boys, Peter dangled upside down from the ceiling holding a webbed up Delmers sandwitch in his hands. Around him were multiple webbed up sandwitches hanging beside him. On the lab table more sandwiches were layed out to satisfy Peter’s never ending hunger. Honestly it was like Peter’s stomach was an endless pit that consumed everything and anything it could.

Harley opened his mouth wide in disbelief before regaining himself.

“You know what? I’m not even going to ask.”

Harley began walking to the lab table eyes never leaving Peter as his boyfriend continued to happily munch on his sandwhich. Harley stopped and pointed to one of the tuna sandwiches that sat on the lab table.

“Can I have one?”

Peter gave Harley an enthusiastic nod and motioned for Harley to have some. In all his years of knowing Peter Harley knew how territorial Peter was when it came to his food. The two boys sat in the lab eating for a bit before Tony walked into the room.

“Watcha doing kiddos?” Tony said with a bright smile, making his way twords the two eating teenagers. “Oooooh are those Sandwitches?”

Not knowing they belonged to Peter Tony grabbed one of the beef sandwitches of the table. Big mistake, Harley thought. Immediately Peter hissed at Tony webbing him up in the process. Peter then grabbed his remaining sandwitches and scurried across the ceiling to a nearby window. Tony was screaming bloody murder and how he adopted a fucking spider into the family before Peter webbed his mouth shut and jumping out the window.

Harley tried holding back a loud laugh as he watched the shit show unfold before his very eyes. “Friday, please tell me you got that on video?”

“I have indeed.” If Harley knew any better who would have though he heard a bit of amusement from the AI.

Oh how Harley loved his spider boyfriend.

tags: told you i wasnt up to anything bad
summary:
Dear Sawyer,
I heard you were struggling with executive dysfunction and doing your homework. I'm here to say that your doing...
body:
Dear Sawyer,

I heard you were struggling with executive dysfunction and doing your homework. I’m here to say that your doing amazing

❤ Peter Parker

@dreamy-skies-station

summary: Hello everyone
body:
Hello everyone

Harley and I have been relaxing and setting up our little house, and the envelope just came down from my dad’s lab and I’m pretty scared I’m not sure if I want to open it

body:
Finally, a new Fic!

What’s up y’all? I finally got around to posting a fic, more of a ficlete, but who’s counting words am I right?

Anyways, links to where you can read it are below!

summary: Misunderstandings can lead to worser things like Kidnapping.
title: Misunderstandings can lead to worser things like Kidnapping.
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Q0z0jy

by TaylorWillcocks

Natasha Romanov aka Black Widow has been kidnapped after a massive fight with her girlfriend Agent Green aka Supergirl (but nobody knows this). Green accidently reveals her powers in order find Natasha.
